channel.title: Many things I need
channel.description:
I need the following things for my server, please post if you have any of them, and you will get credits IN my server.
1. working muting system, with a ::mute player command (player = playerName) 2. my npcs wont walk, i have this [code] //bank spawn = 1597 2892 9677 0 2894 9684 2890 9677 2 Gives starting armour //smith room spawn = 549 2896 9697 0 2896 2698 2894 9696 2 Smith shop //thieving area spawn = 548 2920 9680 0 2916 9683 2921 9678 2 thesalia in thieve area //training area 1 spawn = 90 2931 9697 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2931 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2929 9700 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2934 9696 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 90 2934 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Skeleton spawn = 2275 2929 9702 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2932 9700 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2929 9704 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 2275 2929 9695 0 2928 9704 2934 9695 2 Goblin spawn = 82 2933 9687 0 2934 9683 2929 9688 1 Lesser demon spawn = 82 2930 9685 0 2934 9683 2929 9688 1 Lesser demon spawn = 944 2931 9692 0 2933 9694 2989 9690 2 Armour salesman //middle area spawn = 519 2906 9680 0 2905 9680 2907 9679 2 bobs axes //inshi kitchen spawn = 847 2923 9711 0 2919 9709 2924 9706 2 chef spawn = 886 2919 9707 0 2923 9709 2921 9712 2 chef spawn = 942 2919 9711 0 2918 9709 2923 9709 2 chef [/code] "gives starting armor", or vannaka walks around just like i set, but no others do. why? 3. a working use item on npc, dont give me billysmithers his wont work for mine, even though i fixed the anti leech 4. smithing, I dont know how to go about coding this, how would I? 5. how do i make an items picture appear in a dialogue?
~thanks

item.title: Many things I need
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

I need the following things for my server, please post if you have any of them, and you will get credits IN my server.

  1. working muting system, with a ::mute player command (player = playerName)
  2. my npcs wont walk, i have this
//bank
spawn = 1597	2892	9677	0	2894	9684	2890	9677	2	Gives starting armour

“gives starting armor”, or vannaka walks around just like i set, but no others do. why?
3. a working use item on npc, dont give me billysmithers his wont work for mine, even though i fixed the anti leech
